ch.dermitza.securenio.socket.timeout.threadpool

Class TimeoutExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.dermitza.securenio.socket.timeout.threadpool.TimeoutExecutor
  • Deprecated. 
    since the number of threads allocated is too high for a low to medium client size (anything above 10 clients really).

    public class TimeoutExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    An ExecutorService implementation of implementing timeouts for SocketIFs.
